attributes.action: Stop Immigration health surcharge with immediate effect for overseas nhs staff
attributes.additional_details: We request government to make it effective immediately or at least give a clear policy of refund.
attributes.background: Government has recently announced to scrap immigration health surcharge fee for overseas nhs staff but we are still being charged by home office as there’s no clear policy as to when it will be effective and/if there will be any refund for those paying after Prime minister’s announcement.
